column4: hey when i do sudo aticonfig --initial it does something the gets Aborted (core dumped)
i just followed the guide from http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Feisty_Installation_Guide
i'm at that point to do aticonfig
Okay then, it didn't get around to writing it.
If you chose the fglrx driver, reboot now and you should be okay.
Wait until Xorg asks you to look at the output.
Well, then boot into recovery mode.
Try and start X as normal.
